chapters.title: Chapter 15: A Different Skill
chapters.info: Ned Yarman, p. 336—Warder bonded to Sareitha. He is a tall, broad-shouldered young man with blond hair to his shoulders and bright blue eyes. He and Sareitha have been bonded less than one year. He helps the Andoran Guards by teaching them the sword. See also Tomares, Sareitha.
